# stdkit

Toolkit for Python's standard library

[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/github-code-blue?label=GitHub)](https://github.com/oyghen/stdkit)
[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/stdkit?label=PyPI)](https://pypi.org/project/stdkit)

[![CI](https://github.com/oyghen/stdkit/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg?branch=main)](https://github.com/oyghen/stdkit/actions/workflows/ci.yml)

</div>

```shell
pip install stdkit
```
